title: Sri Lanka to impose LC deposit margins to discourage imports
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka will shortly impose deposit margins on letters of credit to curtail imports, Central Bank Governor Nandalal Weerasinghe said.

“From this monetary policy decision we have re-imposed letter of Credit margin requirement, where all non-essential item importers will have to put money in advance to open LCs., “Governor Weerasinghe said.
